32.eng-name: Dialects and Readings of the Qur'an (Kitab Al-Huruf Wa Al-Qira'at)

hadiths.text: Narrated A'ishah:A man got up (for prayer) at night, he read the Qur'an and raised his voice in reading. When the morning came, the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: May Allah have mercy on so-and-so! Last night he reminded me a number of verses which I was about to forget
